meanings.definition: Resembling a sparrow in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her small, sparrowlike frame made her easily blend in with the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The bird's sparrowlike chirping filled the garden with a sweet melody.
meanings.sent3: The sparrowlike movements of the squirrel trying to steal birdseed were quite comical.
meanings.sent4: His quick, sparrowlike reflexes allowed him to dodge the incoming ball effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sparrowlike flutter of her eyelashes caught his attention immediately.
